metadata.description: Tiana is a hardworking young woman who has always dreamed of owning the finest restaurant in all of Louisiana. When her dreams turn awry, she looks to the evening star and makes a wish, bringing her to face-to-face with the with a frog prince. He promises to make her dreams come true in exchange for a kiss, but when the deal goes sour, they find themselves having to work together in a race against time to put things right.
metadata.name: Disney Manga: The Princess and the Frog
